## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.SET\_BLOCK\_TEXTURE\_URI" property

Emitted when the texture uri of a block entity is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.SET_BLOCK_TEXTURE_URI]: {
        entity: Entity;
        blockTextureUri: string | undefined;
    };
```
